turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with ordering a drink from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: of course. what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a caramel macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No whipped cream, but I would like the caramel drizzle on top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a a venti caramel machiatto, with 2% milk and caramel drizzle, did i get it right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to pick it up in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania the location on Old York Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, all set. your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at jenkingtown, old york road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you so much for your help. I really appreciate it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome! enjoy your coffee. bye!
